'''Tricolor Dango''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Tricolor Dango is obtained from [[Kiminami Anna]] at [[Kiminami Restaurant]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Tricolor Dango restores '''30'''/'''32'''/'''34'''% of Max HP and an additional '''600'''/'''1,250'''/'''1,900''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Yoimiya|Summer Festival Fish}}

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List|Tricolor Dango;Suspicious Tricolor Dango;Delicious Tricolor Dango}}
* During the [[Version 1.6]] web event [[Mysterious Voyage]], if the player completed [[Mysterious Voyage/Story#Inazuma's Must-See!|Inazuma's Must-See!]], Tricolor Dango was delivered to the mailbox within the first three days of the [[Version 2.0]] update.
* It is one of [[Gorou]]'s favorite foods.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Gorou|Favorite Food}}</ref>
* It is one of [[Wanderer]]'s least favorite foods.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Wanderer|Least Favorite Food}}</ref>
